title: prodigious everevolving and sophisticated
extract: A prodigious writer is one who can write a lot and do it well. Prodigious is a word for things that are impressive. If you have prodigious strength, you're very strong. ... This is a strong word that's also kind of formal. Save it for things that really blow you away because of their quality or quantity.
extract_html: A prodigious writer is one who can write a lot and do it well. Prodigious is a word for things that are impressive. If you have prodigious strength, you're very strong. ... This is a strong word that's also kind of formal. Save it for things that really blow you away because of their quality or quantity.
